alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 2:28PM CDT until June 05 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 228 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Maize to near Clearwater, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita, Park City, Valley Center, Goddard, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Sedgwick, Colwich, Conway Springs, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Andale, Bentley, Viola, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport and Lake Afton. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 13 and 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
